author: AnnikaStein
body:
Two files added, which will be used in a PR for cmssw, allowing testing new models for inclusion in 131X and backport to 130X.
For the moment, we would like this PR to _stay open_ until we have the final results with fully converged models, more details to be discussed in [XPOG](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1263008/#10-ak4-jets-tagging-algorithms). 

More context on the training status: we prefer to include the first adversarially trained AK4 tagger (-> high performance + robustness) over the nominal training, if the training in the currently available framework proceeds quickly enough to converge for data-taking. We will likely tweak the ParTAK4.onnx file one more time.

Both models included here have been trained on 122X samples with PUPPI jets, prepared via DeepNTuples -> DeepJetCore -> PyTorch -> ONNX.
title: Add 122X trainings of DeepJet and ParTAK4 (WIP)
